alert.note: Alert for Logan; Scott; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 12:21PM CDT until June 27 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR LOGAN...NORTHERN SCOTT AND WESTERN YELL COUNTIES... At 1221 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Booneville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Waldron... Paris... Danville... Mansfield... Magazine... Subiaco... Ratcliff... Blue Mountain... Cardiff... Midway in Logan County... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Mt Nebo State Park... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Mount Magazine... Oliver... Echo... Lake Dardanelle... Belleville... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
